website_summaries.verdict: Best option for advanced band users.
pros: Bands can be combined so that user can get up to 80 pounds of resistance
Most owners say that they haven't lost elasticity after years of use
cons: Package only includes a few examples of exercises

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews but I feel this should be known. I was doing pec flys and ussuing the door anchor. The velcro on the door anchor failed and the the band hit my back, knocking the wind out of me and leaving a very large welt.
customer_reviews.author: Obi Wan

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly what I was looking for. While the resistance bands are listed incorrectly as to what actually arrived in the mail for me (much higher weight than what's specifically stated here) they still work just as well. I really enjoy using this product. It arrived well packaged and easy to use. I'm already seeing results and this product is the perfect addition to my workout.
customer_reviews.author: PerfectEli

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!! Great durable product!
customer_reviews.text: About 3 months ago I had shoulder surgery and when I was able to start physical therapy, this product was a life saver! It helped me regain my range of motion and the different tension levels were great to help advance and make me stronger. Since then, I've been using this product instead of going to the gym and paying a pricey membership fee. This product is great and I highly recommend to anyone looking to workout anywhere, anytime. I'll definitely be buying more products from Tribe!
customer_reviews.author: Amir M.

customer_reviews.title: ... out bands and I must state I am quite happy with the seller Tribe
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer as and for work out bands and I must state I am quite happy with the seller Tribe. The package even included explanation on how to work out with the bands and provided a color guide which is very helpful since I don't know the first thing about a band work out. I decided to try the band work out since I read Tom Brady only used bands to work out. Great product try and you will receive the benefits of working out with bands and receive a different type of strength work out.
customer_reviews.author: yoda

customer_reviews.title: Happy to recommend
customer_reviews.text: I recently suffered multple fractures to my ankle. I had surgery and was pronounced immobile for the next 8 weeks. I'm not real good at keeping still. I needed to find some means of keeping the rest of my body in some kind of shape while my ankle healed. This gym was the solution. For that reeason, I bought three of them.. I had almost countless ways to work the rest of my body, from virtually every angle, without putting any weight on the injured leg.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Shear

customer_reviews.title: Broke 2nd day of using it... Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with these bands the first day of using them (when I was doing very easy exercises), but the second day, (when I used them for pilates) the band snapped and got me pretty good on my leg. Very disappointing, considering that I didn't feel like I was stretching it beyond what it was meant for.
customer_reviews.author: swoods

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Original review with 5 stars: Haven't tried all of them, yet. The ones I have used are great. The handles are comfortable. The bands are quality. UPDATE 4/7/16: the green band snapped right off! UGH. Not happy at all, and I'm not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how this product has good reviews! Mine were used by someone else and ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this product has good reviews! Mine were used by someone else and then shipped to me. The bands have handprints on them. The instruction pamphlet had some gross food/juice all over it. The door wedge attachment was already destroyed. See pictures. Don't order these!
customer_reviews.author: Tara B

customer_reviews.title: I would like to upload more photos but I do not think ...
customer_reviews.text: Take care, broken at second use. I end up at the hospital. I almost lost a testicle and some teeth, I would like to upload more photos but I do not think it is appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pablo C.

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the red band broke in under a week of ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the red band broke in under a week of use. I only used them to warm up and it broke near the handle. I have already begun the return/refund process through Amazon. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: TNguyen

customer_reviews.title: Less and 6 months old, one of the bands has already snapped.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah so the 50lb band snapped off. Doing arm curls only with it so it should NOT have snapped in any way. PASS ON THESE. No way it should have broken/snapped off within less than 6 months of owning them.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Band snapped!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give these a better review but then this morning Inwas doing a Pilates resistance band workout and it snapped against my leg. Not happy! See instant bruise and snapped band in photo
customer_reviews.author: Nightingale Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Broken on first use
customer_reviews.text: Red band broke doing Flys on first use second set. I'm only 5'10 so I can't imagine they aren't meant to stretch my arms length. I didn't coil them or anything just straight 1 arm under feet to other arm snapped as soon as I lifted my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Slice

customer_reviews.title: Defect or poorly constructed - black band broke on 3rd day
customer_reviews.text: Simply stated, after 3 days of use the black band snapped where it meets the connector on the handle. After looking at other reviews, after I purchased, I see other buyers had similar issues. Maybe a defect or simply poorly constructed, regardless it is frustrating to have to return and get another product. I've uploaded a picture.
customer_reviews.author: GAT

customer_reviews.title: I am not very happy with the quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: I am not very happy with the quality of this product. The second to lightest snapped after using it literally less than 10 minutes leaving a mark on my arm and a broken band. Will not be ordering from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout Bands of Different Weights
customer_reviews.text: These bands are great for different exercises and they have different weights to them. I've used them for many workouts (at least 2-3 times a week) and they hold up very well. You can add the weights to the handles and it's very easy to get on and take off. You can also do workouts for your legs which is great too. You're able to do workouts that can help your whole body depending on what you're looking to work on. It's definitely worth buying if you don't have time to make it to the gym like me because of my work schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Crouthers

customer_reviews.title: Excited to use them!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail a lot earlier than expected, haven’t been able to use them yet but it looks promising. I got all 12 pieces (5 resistance band ropes, 2 ankle straps, 2 handles, 1 door anchor, 1 travel size bag, and the guidebook.) I love how it was packaged and that each resistance band are labeled by its intensity weight! I’ll update this review once I get to use it more often. I’m mostly here to upload some photos of the items.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Banana

customer_reviews.title: Snapped: Broken Bands & Blood Vessels
customer_reviews.text: After months of use, the blue band broke at the connector & snapped against my hands during a tricep workout. Was always skeptical of how flimsy they looked, however, I relied on and respected their "ANTI-SNAP PROMISE" and that promise was indeed broken. All in all, false advertising & a poor product.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction
customer_reviews.text: Very solid construction. The bands feel high-quality and they don't feel like they're going to break. I even do deep swimmer's press ala P90X and they don't show any signs of wanting to break. Will they last forever? No. No work out equipment does. But at this price, and with the basic ability to budget and plan for the future, anyone can afford to replace them when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: T. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Love the bands, hate the clasps
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the product especially that the set comes with two ankle straps instead of one like most resistance bands sets. What I'm not happy about is the clasps that you attach the handles and ankle straps to. The clasps are so small it's hard to get them open to attach and detach the handles. I was going to buy a second set but that is a deal breaker for me. I'm constantly changing the handles out to a different band resistance and my fingers have started hurting from trying to get the darn things attached and detached.
customer_reviews.author: MSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use. Not cheaply made. Very sturdy. I was surprised at how quickly they came in the mail. Would order from them again. Very happy with this product. I also like how THEY reached out to me to make sure I was happy with my purchase. Not one of those “we got your money but don’t care about you” companies. Would define order from them again. Thanks for the great product! 😁
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is #1 for Tribe - Proved by action!
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Tribe found my comment and made things right by refunding me and sending me a new set. I was very surprised and grateful for this, hopefully I had a defective one and the new ones will work properly, but either way I have to give a good review for a company willing to find customers with bad experiences and make things right! Thank you Tribe! First time using them they broke and smacked me in the face, I was able to repair it, but am afraid to really use them as they're intended because they might break again. What Broke: The band came out of the handle
customer_reviews.author: Trevor G.

customer_reviews.title: I gym ing a bag.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice bands. I like the handles that were included and they easily hook the one or several bands for additional tension. Although there are higher strengh bands on the market, these are very versatile and support my training needs. I bring them on my business trips and use them when the gym is not convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold from Taylorsville NC

customer_reviews.title: gets You Thorugh the Period When Gyms Are Closed
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be better constructed than others I've seen. They come with a downloadable exercise book, or varied exercises, as well as a small printed booklet of a few exercises. These are handy for travel. In this days of the pandemic, they can be very useful, as weight plates for dumbbells and other home gym equipment can be scarce. They do have a slightly different feel than dumbbells. All in all, these are really worth the money, especially in these times.
customer_reviews.author: savyon941

customer_reviews.title: Broken less then 6 months poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Used for less than 6 months and green band broke first in one end then on the other end. See photos. Broke in the same place. Would not recommend if they only last 6 months. UPDATE:. Emailed company about product and in less then 24 hours I was contacted by them. And in less then a week I had a whole brand new set sent to me free of charge. So for the customer service I am revising my rating. I will continue to use the bands and will update if any further problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Check your bands
customer_reviews.text: They appear to be well-made and perfectly functional (particularly at this price). Just make sure to check your bands prior to use. The blue one we received was clearly defective and I am sure would have failed in the same manner as some of these other reviews if used. I am not really sure how their "ANTI-SNAP PROMISE" listed in the description is supposed to work but I was not willing to test it out with a clear defect. I did catch it and the customer service has been great. I am supposed to be getting replacement in about a month due to the pandemic. Will update my review if/when that happens and after some more use.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The bands are fine so far. I have only had them a few weeks. I connected them to my incline trainer with the ankle straps, so I can work my arms while I'm on the machine. I have these thing attached all over the place so I can work my arms, back and chest. My daughter has a treadmill also, and I bought her a set. (I actually use 2 sets so I can get the same resistance on both arms.)
customer_reviews.author: AMcC

customer_reviews.title: Great travel band set!
customer_reviews.text: Great versatile band set with SO many options, whether working out at home, in a hotel, in a gym, or even outside. This set has significantly increased my options and opportunities to work out!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson L. Malizia

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had spent my money on a better product.
customer_reviews.text: The red band broke on the first time using it. I have used many resistance bands and never had one break, especially on the first time using it. Wish I had spent my money on a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be shorter
customer_reviews.text: Only real complaint. They’re too long. If they were an inch or two shorter they’d be perfect. I’m 5’ 10”. The handles are 11”, and the bands seem to be over 4’ long. Attached they’re over 6’. Yeah I know we’re supposed to stand on them for tension but even at proper shoulder width apart there’s still a ton of slack. Hard to describe
customer_reviews.author: M. James

customer_reviews.title: SNAPPED!
customer_reviews.text: Used this happily for 3 months. A few days ago one of them snapped, hitting with the force of a giant rubber band. There was no serious injury, but this is disappointing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Resmai

customer_reviews.title: Busted anchor, busted lip
customer_reviews.text: So far, none of my bands have broken like a fair amount of users. But the door anchor broke and rocketed the plastic ball at my face at 90mph. Luckily my teeth were not damaged, but it doubled my lip size temporarily. I am very hesitant to try using the bands even without the anchor at this point. Do yourself a favor, search the negative reviews (unlike I did before purchasing) to see how often these break. Then search for higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: James McQue

customer_reviews.title: One broke the first day of use and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: One broke the first day of use and it was such a hassle to return I ended up having to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a decent workout on my first use. Does offer a optional warrrenty free.
customer_reviews.text: It gives a decent workout; although I was a bit concerned about the durability of the product based on reviews. A manufacturer offered lifetime warranty eased most of those issues. My recommendation to those that purchase this product is to check the band for faults before use and avoid stretching it beyond 2.5x it's length. If the band does snap for any reason, you can take the opportunity to get a new one if you signed up for the optional free manufacturers warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Tickleberries

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 5 bands have failed within the first month. Now i have multiple people from the company requesting a ridiculous amount of information in order to replace their products. You are best to avoid this company
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese junk. Thoroughly disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality. One end of the blue band was installed incorrectly and is now "inside out" from its proper configuration. The webbing is very thin and rubs the outside of your fist when using the handle attachments. I doubt it's strength and cautiously await its failure with each pull. The hardware seams very lightweight considering the ramifications of its failure.
customer_reviews.author: CrowTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very dangerous and not snap proof
customer_reviews.text: Originally loved these. My green band is great. However I started using the yellow for some exercises and the second time I used it it snapped clean in half. I almost lost an eye. I'm not a large person, no way I should have been able to snap one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Katie G

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest set of resistance bands!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my expensive set of resistance bands in a long distance move. I saw these on sale an thought I would give them a try. As soon as I caught a glimpse of them I was horrified by the cheap rubber and the cheap clasps. There no way I was keeping these even if the price was good. I want a durable product, and I just don't see this as being a product that will last. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Broke after three months.
customer_reviews.text: The round piece that allows you to use this in a door jamb broke while doing pulls after only three months of use. It just straight broke and the bands smacked me right in the face.
customer_reviews.author: Szymon R.

customer_reviews.title: Useless at present
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to use these yet because the thing that you put over or under door to hold the resistance bands safely doesn't work with my doors. There's a little "nub" that is supposed to hold it in place but it doesn't. Slips through... Tried to contact seller using the contact link in the email but that gets an error. So product is next to useless until I figure out a safe method to secure the band's to under or over the door.
customer_reviews.author: Cam Walton

customer_reviews.title: How Cheap Can They Make the Components?
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I've been using these for a few days and they are so frustrating. The carabiners are as small and cheap as the company could possibly get away with. They barely fit the straps so you have to wrestle with hooking them up each time to get the handle attachment to fit in the carabiner. The metallic parts are also not smooth so I have cut myself on them. It's just stupid. They are made by people who don't frequently use these products or care about the user experience.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Walla

customer_reviews.title: False or misleading resistance rating.
customer_reviews.text: 80 lbs of resistance? Are you serious? I had to stretch the bands very far just to lift a single 40 lb dumbbell with all the bands connected. These things don't provide anywhere near 80 lbs of resistance for typical use. Maybe that's their breaking point or something. Or maybe if you connect them to a wall 12 feet away and start your reps with them stretched to twice their length, they might provide the resistance they're rated at. Aside from that, I'd actually give this set a good rating. They're not bad overall. I just cannot give a good rating to a product that doesn't even come close to meeting expectations based on the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Guardfather

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The blue band snapped the first time I used it. Disappointing. I was hoping the set would be good. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Potentially dangerous
customer_reviews.text: These exercise bands can be dangerous. I bought this for my son, who was exercising as directed in the instructions when the band failed, sending the metal clip attachment into his forehead, leaving him with a deep one inch gash, along with a likely concussion (headache, sensitivity to light and loud noises for several days). The rubber band also snapped across his face, fortunately just leaving welts. He was lucky, too, because the damage could have been much worse if the clip had struck elsewhere. I would be very cautious about putting much strain on any exercise band with metal parts.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hassett

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It's a moderate set, and I guess fits the price. One thing I would change is the door anchor. I had the TO Bands and that anchor was excellent. I never should have given them away. That set was hard-core...the clips were a lot bigger, etc... the anchor had a metal O-ring to click the bands to, to prevent wear and tear from running them through the fabric and helps you to do a lighter tension, which is what i need right now. For the price, it's fine. I use my set for physical therapy.
customer_reviews.author: BumblB

customer_reviews.title: Great quarantine workout!
customer_reviews.text: Since nobody knows when the world will ever get back to normal, the gym isn’t a viable option for the foreseeable future. Fortunately, these fitness bands will help me stay in shape in what can quickly become a sedentary life. I’m finding it as challenging as weights on cable machines. Also, it all fits into a bag that fits into a suitcase easily enough that it will be great for travel as well. I’m recommending these to my friends, but they are currently in dear supply. But I think they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Nova

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: My green band is about an inch longer than the other bands. The yellow is second longest, the black and blue are the same, and the red is shorter. The clips are nearly useless. They're very tiny and very tense, and changing the bands takes about 10x longer than it should. The guide that came with it looked like a generic picture guide that had been photocopied a thousand times. Barely visible and no explanations.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Honestly wanted to like these. Tried getting them instead of free weights due to space issues but was let down by the total lack of any resistance. Possible that the band's are actually just too long but as someone who is 6' that's not doing them any favors either. Even when looping together "90" pounds of resistance it was easier than wading through ankle high water.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Veteto

customer_reviews.title: I AM SO IMPRESSED!
customer_reviews.text: These bands are great. They offer outstanding and even resistance through the full range of motion. They are quite versatile. The hooks are smooth, so my husband and I can work out together without wasting lots of time changing weights between sets. This seller has EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!! I did have an issue with one band breaking, about 3-1/2 months after my purchase. The seller contacted me swiftly and cordially. They sent a replacement to me immediately. I am so impressed. You should buy these bands if you want a Good product and great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Dilts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome band set!
customer_reviews.text: First thing I want to say is how well this company responds to messages! With Covid 19 shutting down the gyms, everyone was scouring the stores and websites for exercise equipment; I managed to get one set of their bands before stock depleted and loved them. I quickly found out I needed additional resistance to duplicate my gym workouts - nothing to be had. I kept in contact, and then one day I received and e-mail they were back in stock. Had them 3 days later! HAPPY CAMPER! The bands appear to be holding up great after 3 months of almost daily workouts in my garage, and they are getting plenty of loading.
customer_reviews.author: scooter

customer_reviews.title: 3rd set
customer_reviews.text: I know this is the third set my husband ordered for me after the first two sets the blue one breaks and the black one one also in a set, I asked him to order me another set but I guess he keeps picking from my past orders. If the blue one breaks again after the limited time that there can be no refunds I will do my own ordering thats for sure. But I don't return because he thinks he did a nice thing for me to continue my workout and I just don't have the heart to tell him this set sucks really bad.
customer_reviews.author: MyLinh

customer_reviews.title: Great for a workout at home or the gym
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in order to work out at home, but also to do some specific moves at the gym, which doesn't have all the equipment I needed. These bands of varying resistance are very versatile! I can target specific muscle groups by placing the door support at varying heights. I'm waiting for my bench to arrive and once it does, I'm going to use the bands for hip thrusts. The ankle straps aren't uncomfortable at all and the handles move easily for doing flys, etc. Lats get good work by anchoring at the top of the door frame. So far, there isn't a single move I've wanted to do that I can't do with these bands.
customer_reviews.author: IdahoGrown

customer_reviews.title: Good bands until they snap
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bands about three months ago, and just yesterday my black band snapped in the middle of my workout. I was pretty happy with them until then, and would like to find out about getting a replacement or an exchange as the product description claims that you can get a new set if they become damaged or break.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Boissiere

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: These bands are great for anywhere fitness. No matter where you are or going you can pack a set of these and will have no excuse as to why you can't workout. They are crafted well and the item itself comes as ordered. The handles will hold up but with constant use, expect some wear on them.
customer_reviews.author: D.T.Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well made, small package that you can take anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to gain more flexibility and strength because my job is very physical and I'm 62 years old. I was diagnosed with two previously torn rotator cuffs, the doctor says it might have happened years ago. He said although they healed, they didn't heal correctly so he encouraged me to do a specific set of exercises that will aid in me gaining more flexibility. He said for me to use dumbells or resistance bands. I have the dumbells, but opted for Tribe Resistance bands. In using these, I find them safer than weights and can use these bands a myriad of different ways. These are the best. Thank you for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne G. Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Good initially but not built to last more than a few months
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for a little over 4 months and two of the bands have already snapped off. The resistance band snapped off from the handle rendering both useless. I used them 2-3 times a week AT MOST and do not do too strenuous activities with them. I am fairly disappointed with the quality of these resistance bands. I am giving 2 stars because I got 4 months use from them but wish the quality was more sturdy and tough.
customer_reviews.author: Alex V.

customer_reviews.title: Ability to add “weight” for more resistance and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to add multiple cords to increase the resistance! The product is good quality and am very happy that I chose this product!! I would definitely recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for quality bands at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality. With ONLY 60lbs of resistance the stitching completely failed on the leg strap, and is now unusable. After that, I attempted to use ONLY the ten pound band and the carabiner slipped out from the actual band making that part unusable as well. I can likely fix the blue band by tying a not, but I wish I would have simply bought another set. Learn from my mistake and do the same
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Handles are a pain
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent set. However, it only comes with 1 set of handles so if you want to switch the bands quickly during your workout, you have to stop and switch out the handles. It’s not preferable if you’re doing a variety of exercises with different body parts and want to go from light to heavy or vice verse. Also, the metal attachments sometimes pinch if you’re wrapping around your wrists or hands. Otherwise these are ok. I’ve used them a lot but again, the handles are missing because one of the kids took them off! So now I really can’t use the set anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jared M.

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Don’t let some pics scare you!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I just bought them to expand my home gym capabilities. They are high quality and give you lots of options for exercises. The two handles and to leg straps provide lots of options. I don’t know how or why so many people have terrible reviews. My guess is they don’t understand how bands are meant to be used. Likely that they treat them like a full cable machine and that’s not going to be the same. These are great and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value.
customer_reviews.text: The bands are very good and let You adjust or double up for more weight. However, they are price gouging now with the lockdown. More than double. This is a rip off, where it was a good deal before. While I recommend this product, look elsewhere for a better price. I would never buy from this seller again after they started ripping people off.
customer_reviews.author: Zuna

customer_reviews.title: Pay a little more for Bodylastics - well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is lacking. The carabiners are too small and have sharp edges that combine to make changing or stacking bands a real pain. Several of our carabiners were corroded. The handles are a bit too narrow for adult- sized hands. We returned these and spent a little more for the Bodylastics brand insteax. MUCH better quality!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: redoing my review
customer_reviews.text: So I am redoing my review! This product is ok but I am giving it a 2 stars now bc I've used it a few times to work out my legs and have hurt my ankles bc of the velcro that's suppose to hold it together. It even rubs when u wear socks! I do not like that part and noticed it wasn't put together very well bc there's a peice detaching and maybe that's why it's rubbing on my ankles. Oh and the handles are ok but they make it hard to do certain things bc when u attach it to the bands as u are suppose to the are kinda crooked
customer_reviews.author: Casie Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 12 piece set. I received 10 pieces. I am missing the handles, the reason I purchased this set. I was looking forward to using this set but kind of pointless without handles.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Progression, not perfection.
customer_reviews.text: I missed weight lifting, my yoga class and massage therapy. So I tried this out to loosen my neck and shoulder pain. It worked. Thanks to the door stopper they provided. Exercises similar to those I learned from my PT sessions, but the different resistance belt up to 35lbs or more actually feels like lifting weights. Therefore, I give it a 4 stars. After all, it is not as perfect as those gym equipments, but close enough to help with muscle toning for stiff neck, shoulder, and back. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Now that gyms are closed because of the coronavirus....!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this set awhile back for some shoulder issues I was having. Now I can use them for a whole range of exercises to keep myself in shape until I can get back to the gym. Considering myself a gym rat, it's not quite the same, but it gives me something to work with. And the product seems like a quality one. And you can access a good workout book on their website. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: E. DeSantis

customer_reviews.title: Two of my bands broke after approximately three months of purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I loved the bands and its versatility; however, two of my bands broke while doing pretty easy exercises (not abnormal strain on the bands). After one broke, I was open to replacing that band; however, after the second bank snapped today, I'm going to have to try to find more durable bands. I'm just surprised how easy they snapped after simple exercises. I'm disappointed and in hindsight, these are expensive for bands that snap pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ive enjoyed this product throughly but soon issues begun to occur. I have had this for less than one month and the handle has broken. Now after a month and a half. This is absolutely ridiculous and although i have been given a 30% refund for the handle this is sickening for me that these bands have broken this soon
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this product! I can't speak about breakage or durability at this time, although those are important issues. But I can say that these things have come light years in terms of quality and usability from even a few years ago. I'm pleasantly surprised! More accessories would be nice, such as an assemble-able curl/row bar, or perhaps padded cuffs, but these are very useable as is. I found them worth the purchase price!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: A complete and durable set, if a little overestimated
customer_reviews.text: This set has been great as a portable, daily use workout set for moving between my office and home, although I do feel like the band resistance weights are a bit overstated. 65lbs of these feels about the same as one of my other bands that is rated at 30lbs. Other than the possible weight discrepancy, these bands have been great for daily use. I've used them anywhere from 20 minutes to 90 minutes per day for the last 1.5 months with no signs of wear. The included exercise instruction sheet has been helpful in targeting specific areas, too. I'll be buying this or another Tribe set in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Dyllan L.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the bands are thin and the door attachment snaps off easily Update: the company responded to my concerns and sent a replacement door hinge without being asked. They get a 5+ on customer service. I will see if the new hinge works better The hook system, as stated by others, would benefit from more of a carabiner style. The bands feel thin with inconsistent and below stated resistance. Because of the door hook, I have not used the system enough to attest to durability Again, the company gets credit for spontaneously reaching out to me
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stein

customer_reviews.title: Very upset over durability
customer_reviews.text: Was enjoying the bands and overall was satisfied. However became very upset when I noticed the green band starting to show signs of tearing. The blue one has developed a hole in the middle and the green now has a rip in it. NO I didn’t abuse them and only used them as directed. Never used around Sharp objects or anything like that. So in a nutshell I’m a bit upset over the life of the bands.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Quarintine work out approved, just don't over do it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product back in December 2019, hoping to start working out (new years resolutions). But I didn't really get in to daily use until quarintine 2020. I've been using this set daily since the lock down started, and it's been extremely useful. Unfortunately it appears that there is a shelf life on daily use. After 3 months the 20lb band snapped. I would totally recommend it's using them but I wish this band lasted at least till December 2020 (a year)
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the bands and how this company operates!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly fast delivery thru Amazon Prime NEXT DAY, arrived in perfect condition & great packaging, nice little bag everything w/the bands go into, immediate email from company introducing themselves, including a pdf of info and exercises using the bands, the lifetime warranty is impressive, and a giveaway I'm enrolled in! Wow! I'm impressed! Also, the bands "feel" nice and smooth, I like the clips to attach to the different straps, and feel confident using them.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great workout set
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I purchased this a couple days ago and received it today. I like how it comes with attachments. The door attachment so you can workout your back. As well as hand attachments so you can adjust the weight of the resistance. And the leg attachments. Overall this is a great buy. Well worth the money. Also you get a lifetime warranty. So you know it’s quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Beef up the nylon
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set, only issue is the nylon straps throughout, handles, door anchor, etc are very thin. It makes one worry doing reps of 100lbs and hearing the sound it makes. I have never broken one, they just are thinner than other sets and i give it a four star due to the anticipation of a black eye, bump on the head, or wherever else could get hit if it decides to break.
customer_reviews.author: brian nichols

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing defect - avoid
customer_reviews.text: Would’ve loved to have kept this, but I returned it because of a manufacturing defect. One of the band ends was mounted in the middle of the band. The set was also missing a handle. The material quality was actually better than the replacement I ordered, but oh well! Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Derek I

customer_reviews.title: They work but they aren't the best.
customer_reviews.text: The bands work well. If you want bands they could be what you want. However, there are a few cons that I can't stop running into. Pros: - They seem to be well made. - The door attachment actually fits in doors. It's great. Others tend to be too big. Cons: - Amazon lists each color by approximate resistance weight. The packaging doesn't mention those numbers anywhere. - The handgrips are awful. They are way too small which results in the rough side material rubbing on your hands at all times. The padding is thin and the grips starts to feel hard.
customer_reviews.author: jstanton

customer_reviews.title: Well made resistance band set
customer_reviews.text: I got the tribe resistance band set rated at 150 lbs. it arrived on time and seems to be a sturdy set. the resistance is good and allows for most exercises I do at the gym on cable machines. pull downs and overhead pulling exercises are the exception since I am doing at home and do not have high rafters or some way to secure them overhead. most exercises can be secured to a closed door or underfoot and I am satisfied. I have just gotten these two days ago so I cannot comment on the long term durability but they seem to be built well at this point. I would recommend them based on my experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stu R

customer_reviews.title: Keep the workour going during Covid
customer_reviews.text: I needed a way to keep working out while in gyms were shutdown. I had seen a few reviews both positive and negative. Price was not to bad so the gamble was on. So far worked out pretty good. There were a few bumps while getting use to working out with resistance bands. I finally found a good resistance workout app. That was kind of the game changer,. Now I am able to get a pretty good workout at home.
customer_reviews.author: Oddfact

customer_reviews.title: good quality but more expensive that other options
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for almost two weeks now and have been doing in home workout with them almost everyday. They seem to be durable and of a good quality and I've been able to do different workouts using them. Only problem is that I am going to need bands with higher weights (I've already ordered and will write review for them as well) so this is good for lighter workout until the new sets arrive and my wife could have these all for herself.
customer_reviews.author: NimaH

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, durable, affordable bands
customer_reviews.text: These bands are perfect for my needs. I like the versatility of the 5, 15, and 25 pound resistance. They’re easy to use with the door loop for different levels of need for the various exercises. I downloaded the e-book of exercises and printed it and it’s very helpful as well. For the price, durability, and convenience, I highly recommend these bands.
customer_reviews.author: Craig G

customer_reviews.title: Loving this set!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. As time goes on I'll update this review. My only regret so far is not buying 2 of them when they were on sale for a little over 20 bucks now priced a little over 40. I've been rehabbing my left arm, elbow and shoulder from a accident. So far it's been a huge help and I've seen muscle increase and most of all strength and good movement back. These bands are worth the get go. I highly recommend them. Thanks guys, keep up the quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to Exercise on the Road
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing a lot of traveling for work. As someone who lifts free weights on a regular basis, I found it hard to do any exercise while I was away. I ordered this product as a way to do at least some strength training. It's been a great tool so far, and I look forward to using it more. Thanks, Tribe Fitness, for creating something that's small enough to put into my suitcase yet yields great benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Haynie, author of The Athena File

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile training option
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these resistance bands. With a little creativity, you can hit all your muscle groups. You can perform pretty much any lift with these bands that you can with a dumbbell set for a fraction of the price. The resistance is easy to adjust, by attaching any combination of the bands together. Each band is labeled with its resistance weight, so they are easy to figure out. If you connect them all together, you will end up with some pretty decent resistance. I plan to order another set, so I will have even more options for training. I highly recommend these, for anyone looking for an affordable yet effective training option.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Velcro doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro does NOT hold. I was training with just a couple bands when the Velcro let loose and the attached d-ring flew at me. It shattered one of my teeth and I needed 5 stitches in my lip. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: cackleberry

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was nervous that these bands would pop (everyone claims that they won't), but they have been holding up well so far! I can perform my exercises without worry and the best part is being able to stack bands to increase the tension. There is only one gripe that I could not figure out, the bands seem a bit long for some of the exercises. I cannot get the tension needed for the effective weight, which requires some creative thinking.
customer_reviews.author: Eziel

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any home gym.
customer_reviews.text: Being in quarantine for 8 months, I haven’t been able to go to the gym. I bought these so I could work my muscles. I was pleasantly surprised by their options and range of motion. I get a fantastic workout thanks to them. They also seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I'll leave an update.
customer_reviews.text: The product works as intended. I'm very tall so there are exercises I can't do without possibly damaging the cables. I wish the handle grips were a little wider. I wish the resistance weight was a little heavier. I'm hesitant on any cable resistance bands. I've had them for about a week but I'm going to give them 90 days because that seems to be the shelf life of most resistance cables.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: My At-Home, On-The-Go Workout Dream
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I needed to get some weight training into my routine. Regular weights are bulky and don't travel well so these seemed like a good option and are they ever. So easy to use and there are literally a gazillion workouts on youtube you can follow along to. You could easily bring just one or two of the bands and the handles in your purse if you wanted a quickie during lunch and will certainly be ideal next time I travel. Big fan.
customer_reviews.author: K. Friday

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price. Take with me when traveling, lightweight and takes little space.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Gives you a very effective workout
customer_reviews.text: The resistance bands have allowed me and my husband to continue our workout regime while we "stay at home" during the virus outbreak. We are impressed with how effective the bands are and imagine also using them when we are on vacation. The bands are very good quality and the extensive instruction manual is easy to follow. We are very happy with this product. Update Removed a star because the red band has a tear from stress of using it which should not happen.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, have been using for a month and see no sign of wear!
customer_reviews.author: Stephane Bowen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.. fingers crossed. Got them late last night and did a short workout with them this morning. They seem very nice, and upgraded from some of the issues I've seen expressed on here, such as the velcro on the door anchor failing.. no velcro on my door anchor? really love that it has a door anchor, in fact.. it makes the workouts so much more versatile. Will update if anything happens!
customer_reviews.author: Ohukno

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I was skeptical at first but decided to buy anyway and man oh man. My husband watches me as I open my package and immediately... you know men know it all. He begins so criticize my bands, oh those are weak or oh people get hurt, etc, etc. Within 10 minutes it changed to oh you can add bands for resistance, oh you can do this/that, etc. I was cracking up because I played with it, used it about 10 minutes and he took over :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Ankle strap rips in half on first use
customer_reviews.text: On day two of using this kit the ankle strap ripped in half. This was only the first time using the ankle strap leaving me wondering what I spent my money on.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Hard Pass - Weak and Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Do not get the weaker set from the same manufacturer if you plan on using the bands for any kind of strength or hypertrophy. Tribe makss a better/stronger band set which is highly recommended. These however are weak and dangerous. I'm not very strong, I planned to use these bands at home while quarantined for high volume light resistance and both the handle and door anchor started to break down. I decided to throw them both away after a band snapped out of the door and almost injured me.
customer_reviews.author: Nimzo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality resistance bands, great customer service, and website. Overall quality company.
customer_reviews.text: Have had them for 3 days and so far they seem go be extremely good quality. I was looking for the best set between a couple companies on Amazon and honestly Tribe seemed like the most real company. Like there were actual people running this company, while some other ones seemed sketchy. Actual (great) customer service, quick response to my question, the order which was originally backordered was delivered quicker than expected, and their website has good some good UI. Overall, good experience with the product and company. Price was good too. Definitely recommend if you’re looking for some resistance bands/good workout equipment
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great for everything
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking into multiple bands and want something to use at home or your gym this is it. I gave the durability 3 stars due to the handles. It feels ok at first but, once you drop it after a drop set or an intense workout the handles break easily. Be mindful when using and your surrounding. I would use band and anchor around other gym equipment to perform a certain exercise but the handle wouldn't keep up. This is great though you will be happy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kor

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good product that really challenge the user. I did not give a 5 start because it lack a guide to exercises. For example I have to navigate the web looking for a good routine to do at home but even that do not show how to used the band combinations to add "weight" so I hope I'm doing the combination correctly. Still, this is a excellent set at an excellent price
customer_reviews.author: Braulio Santiago

product_meta.title: Resistance Bands Set, Exercise Bands with Stackable Workout Bands, Door Anchor, Handles, Ankle Straps & Advanced eBook - for Resistance Training, Physical Therapy, Home Workouts, Pilates
feature_bullets: PREMIUM SERIES RESISTANCE BANDS WITH ADJUSTABLE TENSION LEVEL. This 12 piece set includes 5 color-coded resistant tube bands (5LB, 15LB, 20LB, 30LB, 35LB), 2 cushioned handles, 1 door anchor, 2 ankle straps, 1 waterproof carry bag & an advanced exercise eBook (downloadable online).

ANTI-SNAP PROMISE – Our premium workout bands are made of the highest quality, using 100% Natural Latex from Malaysia with high elasticity and extra thick high-grade silicon that will not dry out, snap, or deform. Developed with you in mind, each tube band is double layered and carefully constructed to provide maximum resistance! Our team at Tribe Fitness has 10+ years of experience manufacturing silicon products and we fully stand behind the quality of our products!

COMBINABLE STRENGTH DESIGNED FOR ANY FITNESS LEVEL - Color-coded and individually labeled, our exercise bands were designed using ideal resistance levels to help you maximize your workouts. The bands can be used alone or stacked in any combination to achieve your optimal resistance level up to 105 lbs.

TONE YOUR BODY AND BUILD YOUR BEST BOOTY - Whether you are a professional athlete looking to enhance your training, a beginner or an expert exercise enthusiast looking for a more effective workout, this versatile set will empower your training for faster and more effective results! Use these bands to intensify your muscles and build that perfect beach body! They are also the perfect resistance bands for legs and butt, glute/leg training, toning your chest, abs, biceps, triceps and more!

QUALITY PROMISE FOR LIFE. At TRIBE we believe in earning your trust and loyalty. Our products are the finest in the industry and offered at the best prices! BUY IT and feel secured that we will take great care of you!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
